blogPost.title: What advice do you give to anyone who is interested in becoming a local journalist? Answer by Ken Ward Jr., Reporter at The Charleston Gazette-Mail, West Virginia. https://t.co/IMhc7gpNiF https://t.co/BaXPW7DkTQ
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 您对有志于成为一名地方记者的人有什么建议？回答者：小肯-沃德，西弗吉尼亚州《查尔斯顿公报邮报》记者。https://t.co/IMhc7gpNiF https://t.co/BaXPW7DkTQ。
您對有志於成爲一名地方記者的人有什麼建議？回答者：小肯-沃德，西弗吉尼亞州《查爾斯頓公報郵報》記者。https://t.co/IMhc7gpNiF https://t.co/BaXPW7DkTQ。

previous.title: What are some myths about blood pressure? Answer by @KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/uhZwzPCRBs https://t.co/mAZlAjfFqQ

localize.full_text: 关于血压的误区有哪些？由 @KeckMedUSC 回答。https://t.co/uhZwzPCRBs https://t.co/mAZlAjfFqQ。
關於血壓的誤區有哪些？由 @KeckMedUSC 回答。https://t.co/uhZwzPCRBs https://t.co/mAZlAjfFqQ。

next.title: Should parents limit their children's screen time? Answer by @tamibhaumik, VP of Marketing & Digital Civility @Roblox. https://t.co/T4yTr8PXcc https://t.co/nnR7BffbON

localize.full_text: 父母应该限制孩子的屏幕时间吗？回答者：@tamibhaumik，营销副总裁& 数字文明@Roblox。https://t.co/T4yTr8PXcc https://t.co/nnR7BffbON。
父母應該限制孩子的屏幕時間嗎？回答者：@tamibhaumik，營銷副總裁& 數字文明@Roblox。https://t.co/T4yTr8PXcc https://t.co/nnR7BffbON。
